name: Mirrorflection
description:
NOTE: There may be a few screen tearing issues due to time constraints making setting up cameras difficult

In this game, you play as Reflec, a creature that has been recently found itself with a terrible curse: Mirrors. When reflec goes close to a mirror, bad things happen.

Luckily there is hope for Reflec. His good friend Nightshade is has made a deal with him: She will craft a amulet that rids him of his curse, as long as he collects enough artifacts. 

Can Reflec make his way through the temple and collect the artifacts? It's all up to you.

Psst: If you collect almost every artifact, there is a secret ending....

Controls

A/D: Move left and right

Space: Jump

Q: Invisibility Spell
